page.title: 03Activities (continued)
page.content: In our area there is lots to do. Among several places for indoor activities is{Kirkton Community {Centre,}used mainly by people who live in the area. There are activities for all ages and these include badminton, dancing, cooking and drawing classes. Our area also boasts a Countryside Park, an ice rink and a golf course. {Downfield Golf Course}is one of the best inland courses in the country. Founded in 1933, it has a standard scratch of 72 and many famous people have played there, including Peter Thomson, Brian Huggett, Bruce Forsyth and Charlie Drake. Lots of famous competitions have also been held there, and the BBC filmed "Play Golf" there in 1977.
